        "id": "97ae254a.363d88",
        "type": "function",
        "z": "5a4bc84e.8c0ba8",
        "name": "OPC to influxdb msg-object conversion",
        "func": "msg.payload = parseFloat(msg.payload);\nmsg.measurement = msg.topic;\nreturn msg;",
